# Read the App Information of a Bundle ID | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ Read the App Information of a Bundle ID ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app)

-  Read the App Information of a Bundle ID 

Web Service Endpoint# Read the App Information of a Bundle ID

App Store Connect API 1.2+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/bundleIds/{id}/app
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app#query-parameters)

`fields[apps]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `accessibilityUrl, name, bundleId, sku, primaryLocale, isOrEverWasMadeForKids, subscriptionStatusUrl, subscriptionStatusUrlVersion, subscriptionStatusUrlForSandbox, subscriptionStatusUrlVersionForSandbox, contentRightsDeclaration, streamlinedPurchasingEnabled, accessibilityDeclarations, appEncryptionDeclarations, ciProduct, betaTesters, betaGroups, appStoreVersions, appTags, preReleaseVersions, betaAppLocalizations, builds, betaLicenseAgreement, betaAppReviewDetail, appInfos, appClips, appPricePoints, endUserLicenseAgreement, appPriceSchedule, appAvailabilityV2, inAppPurchases, subscriptionGroups, gameCenterEnabledVersions, perfPowerMetrics, appCustomProductPages, inAppPurchasesV2, promotedPurchases, appEvents, reviewSubmissions, subscriptionGracePeriod, customerReviews, customerReviewSummarizations, gameCenterDetail, appStoreVersionExperimentsV2, alternativeDistributionKey, analyticsReportRequests, marketplaceSearchDetail, buildUploads, backgroundAssets, betaFeedbackScreenshotSubmissions, betaFeedbackCrashSubmissions, searchKeywords, webhooks`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppWithoutIncludesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appwithoutincludesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`An error occurred with your request.

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`Request not authorized.

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`Resource not found.

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app#see-also)

### [Getting Related Data](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-app#Getting-Related-Data)

[`List All Profiles for a Bundle ID`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-profiles)Get a list of all profiles for a specific bundle ID.[`List All Capabilities for a Bundle ID`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-bundleidcapabilities)Get a list of all capabilities for a specific bundle ID.[`GET /v1/bundleIds/{id}/relationships/app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-relationships-app)[`GET /v1/bundleIds/{id}/relationships/bundleIdCapabilities`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-relationships-bundleidcapabilities)[`GET /v1/bundleIds/{id}/relationships/profiles`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-bundleids-_id_-relationships-profiles)
